title: Bandwidth: Xbox Game Pass adds Shredders and offers free Paramount+ trial
content:
This week is a bit quiet for every service except Xbox Game Pass and GeForce Now, which both seem to be adding new material on a constant basis. This week, Shredders comes to Xbox Game Pass, as do a slew of other titles. Additionally, Xbox is giving out a free Paramount+ trial to subscribers.

moreâ€¦

The post Bandwidth: Xbox Game Pass adds Shredders and offers free Paramount+ trial appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: GFN is bringing its usual slew of titles into the mix while Xbox Game Pass is adding Shredders and handing out Paramount+ trials.
